alert.note: Alert for Chase; Frontier; Hayes; Lincoln; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 10:55PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Frontier, southeastern Perkins, east central Chase, central Lincoln and Hayes Counties through 1130 PM CDT/1030 PM MDT/... At 1055 PM CDT/955 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Ringgold to near Wauneta. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Hayes Center, Hershey, Wauneta, Wallace, Maxwell, Wellfleet, Dickens, Lake Maloney, Keith, Maywood, Hamlet, Marengo, Birdwood and Somerset. This includes the following highways... Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 16. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 162 and 180, and between mile markers 182 and 192. Highway 83 between mile markers 46 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
